article_title: Community Health Systems (CYH) Stock Plunges on Court's Obamacare Ruling
article_text:
10 Stocks Billionaire David Einhorn Loves in 2016

David Einhorn is a man of many talents, including playing poker -- and watching where he stacks his chips investment-wise is a worthwhile endeavor, too.

article_metadata.description: Community Health Systems (CYH) stock is down in late-afternoon trading on Thursday after a federal judge ruled against an Affordable Care Act insurance subsidy.
article_metadata.author: Rachel Graf
